catalogue_raissonne: Delteil 65 ii/ii; Croquez ii/ii; Taevernier 65 ii/ii; E.65
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Winter landscape with ice skaters and other figures
inscription:
Dedication in pencil, LR margin: Victor Firman hommage de son ami / James Ensor 1922
Titled in pencil, LL margin: Les Patineurs
medium: Etching with hand-coloring on simili-Japon paper
portfolio: From Published in the 1906 album of "Art Contemporain," Antwerp
provenance: (Theodore B. Donson, New York); sold to MIA, 1979.
signed: Signed and dated in pencil, LR margin: James Ensor ; countersigned in pencil, verso: Ensor
title: Les Patineurs
